reviews.title: Good Place for the Price
reviews.text: We stayed at the Redmond Inn on Friday, May 20 though Sunday, May 22. The staff was extremely friendly, the room was very clean and the toiletries were excellent. Quiet rooms, no noise from the outside.

reviews.title: Quiet the bang for the buck!
reviews.text: Family Pancake house next door is excellent.

reviews.title: Always the Best!
reviews.text: We paid $79.00 per night on special package. We loved the Redmond Inn and would not hestitate to recommend it to anyone.

I travel to the Redmond area quiet often on business and always stay at the Redmond Inn. They by far have the most reasonable prices and the hotel and staff are excellent! I would definitely recommend the Redmond Inn for any business traveler and even leisure travelers as well!
reviews.title: Very nice overall
